hajimenokizu wrote:
  I use
> a download manager that spiders ftps, file server and whole 
> websites. I was at work and yes was doing this on the side so I let 
> it run automatically instead of downloading the links provided one 
> by one. 

I already contacted Kizu off list and offered my apologies. She's been 
part of this list from the beginning and I know she would never do 
anything intentionally wrong.

I was under the impression (and I'm sure Sec was too) that someone had 
to manually search through her university space to retrieve her files.

I apologize also to you all for the public bitchiness, but I'm sure you 
can understand how this struck me the wrong way. I equated it to someone 
reading a book excerpt on my web site then finding a way to access the 
unpublished things I occasionally store and claiming it as their own.

Again, I apologize to Kizu and I hope she'll stay with us. And I ask 
everyone to drop the subject once they see this and not to respond to 
any  posts that get through on the topic in the meantime.



Thank you.
